docs.snippet: Facebook converts many wide-angle panorama photos to 360-degree interactive images when they are uploaded, but you can revert to the original.

docs.snippet: The social network has taken out ads in British newspapers to warn against misinformation, though campaigners say it could do much more.

docs.snippet: A group of news organizations plans to ask Congress for the right to negotiate with the online giants, which are gaining greater shares of digital advertising and distribution.

docs.snippet: Mark Zuckerberg, the company’s chief executive, said he would hire 3,000 more people to monitor posts and live video as the site nears 2 billion users.
